Reviews.Title: Easy setup bad volume
Reviews.Author: R. Murphy
Reviews.Content: I agree with the previous reviewer.  Television was easy to set up, but the issue I have is the speakers.  They are on the back and the bottom of the television and it makes hearing the television really hard.  The other issue I have is the closed captioning.  It does not work.  I don't know if it is this model or the television itself.  Other than volume and closed captioing not a bad television, its light so it went onto the wall really easy, connected to cable easily.  It has a usb plug on the side so you can download things.

Reviews.Title: Very unimpressive. Fuzzy picture
Reviews.Author: Beth McGinn "bethbga"
Reviews.Content: I believe this TV was defective to be fair. There was bleed over from the different inputs. Not compatible with TiVo Premiere on HDMI. It shrunk the picture down to a 24" image and would not zoom. image reshaped, but never got much bigger. I tried this with cable in 3 different rooms and got a fuzzy picture in all of them. The picture on the xbox was very clear with an HDMI cable. I am in the process of returning this item. Paul's TV is the seller and they are understanding and very easy to deal with.  :P

Reviews.Title: Nice Television
Reviews.Author: Glenda J. York
Reviews.Content: We wanted a television that would fit in an existing entertainment cabinet. Love how the side edges of the tv are slim as well as the depth! Can also be used as a computer monitor.Easy set up.We love Sanyo tvs', and have never had any problems with them.

Reviews.Title: It's a TV
Reviews.Author: Jae Mann
Reviews.Content: You watch things on it. It has moving pictures. And sound. I don't know what else you'd ask for. Especially for $149.
